00063 class AttributeSet
00064 {
00065 public:
00066     enum { INVALID_POS = boost::integer_traits<size_t>::const_max };
00067 
00068     typedef boost::shared_ptr<AttributeSet> Ptr;
00069     typedef boost::shared_ptr<const AttributeSet> ConstPtr;
00070 
00071     class Descriptor;
00072 
00073     typedef boost::shared_ptr<Descriptor> DescriptorPtr;
00074     typedef boost::shared_ptr<const Descriptor> DescriptorConstPtr;
00075 
00077 
00078     struct Util
00079     {
00081         struct NameAndType {
00082             NameAndType(const std::string& n, const NamePair& t)
00083                 : name(n), type(t) {}
00084             Name name;
00085             NamePair type;
00086         };
00087 
00088         typedef std::vector<NameAndType> NameAndTypeVec;
00089         typedef std::map<std::string, size_t> NameToPosMap;
00090         typedef std::pair<size_t, uint8_t> GroupIndex;
00091     };
00092

00247 class AttributeSet::Descriptor
00248 {
00249 public:
00250     typedef boost::shared_ptr<Descriptor> Ptr;
00251 
00252     typedef Util::NameAndType             NameAndType;
00253     typedef Util::NameAndTypeVec          NameAndTypeVec;
00254     typedef Util::GroupIndex              GroupIndex;
00255     typedef Util::NameToPosMap            NameToPosMap;
00256     typedef NameToPosMap::const_iterator  ConstIterator;
00257 
00259     struct Inserter {
00260         NameAndTypeVec vec;
00261         Inserter& add(const NameAndType& nameAndType) {
00262             vec.push_back(nameAndType); return *this;
00263         }
00264         Inserter& add(const Name& name, const NamePair& type) {
00265             vec.push_back(NameAndType(name, type)); return *this;
00266         }
00267         Inserter& add(const NameAndTypeVec& other) {
00268             for (NameAndTypeVec::const_iterator it = other.begin(), itEnd = other.end(); it != itEnd; ++it) {
00269                 vec.push_back(NameAndType(it->name, it->type));
00270             }
00271             return *this;
00272         }
00273     };
00274

00325     // Remove the default value if it exists

00336     bool hasSameAttributes(const Descriptor& rhs) const;
00337 
00339     const NameToPosMap& map() const { return mNameMap; }

00342

00364     size_t insert(const std::string& name, const NamePair& typeName);

00367     NameToPosMap                mGroupMap;
00368     MetaMap                     mMetadata;
00369 }; // class Descriptor

00371 
00372 template <typename ValueType>
00373 ValueType
00374 AttributeSet::Descriptor::getDefaultValue(const Name& name) const
00375 {
00376     typedef typename TypedMetadata<ValueType>::ConstPtr MetadataPtr;
00377 
00378     const size_t pos = find(name);
00379     if (pos == INVALID_POS) {
00380         OPENVDB_THROW(LookupError, "Cannot find attribute name to set default value.")
00381     }
00382 
00383     std::stringstream ss;
00384     ss << "default:" << name;
00385 
00386     MetadataPtr metadata = mMetadata.getMetadata<TypedMetadata<ValueType> >(ss.str());
00387 
00388     if (metadata)   return metadata->value();
00389 
00390     return zeroVal<ValueType>();
00391 }
